name: Current Stock
query:
select 
  item.item_code, 
  item.brand, 
  sum(actual_qty) as Qty
from 
  `tabItem` item, 
  `tabStock Ledger Entry` det 
where 
  item.item_code like '24lh454%' 
  and det.item_code=item.item_code 
  and det.docstatus=1 
  and det.posting_date<='2017-08-31' 
group by 
  item.item_code
order by 
  item.brand, 
  item.item_code,
  det.posting_date, 
  det.posting_time

name: Current Warehouse-wise Stock
query: select item.item_code, item.item_group, item.brand, det.warehouse, sum(det.actual_qty) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` det,`tabItem` item where det.docstatus=1 and det.item_code=item.item_code group by det.item_code, det.warehouse order by item.brand, item.item_group, item.item_code

description: Gets current stock from `Stock Ledger Entry` and `Serial No` with Details of Each Serial No and Item
name: Current Stock with Serial No Details
query:
select * from ((select ser.name, ser.item_code, ser.item_group, ser.brand, ser.description, ser.warehouse, 1 as qty,ser.purchase_rate as rate, item.taxes_template from `tabSerial No` ser,`tabItem` item where ser.warehouse is not null and item.item_code=ser.item_code) union all 
(select null, item.item_code, item.item_group, item.brand, item.description, led.warehouse, sum(led.actual_qty),(sum(led.stock_value_difference)/sum(led.actual_qty)), item.taxes_template from `tabStock Ledger Entry` led, `tabItem` item where item.item_code=led.item_code and has_serial_no = 0 and led.docstatus = 1 group by item.item_code, led.warehouse)) a order by brand, item_code
query_name: Current Stock with Serial No Details

name: Entry Checks
query:
select * from (
  (select sum(paid_amount) as `Payment Entry Sum` from `tabPayment Entry` where docstatus=1) pes,
  (select sum(debit) as `GL Payment Sum` from `tabGL Entry` where voucher_type = 'Payment Entry') pe,
  (select sum(grand_total) as `Sales Invoice Sum` from `tabSales Invoice` where docstatus=1) tsi,
  (select sum(debit-credit) as `GL Sales Sum` from `tabGL Entry` where voucher_type = 'Sales Invoice' and party_type is not null) tsge,
  (select sum(grand_total) as `Purchase Invoice Sum` from `tabPurchase Invoice` where docstatus=1) tpi,
  (select sum(credit) as `GL Purchase Sum` from `tabGL Entry` where voucher_type = 'Purchase Invoice' and party_type is not null) tpge,
  (select sum(stock_value_difference) as `GL Stock Sum` from `tabStock Ledger Entry` where voucher_type = 'Stock Entry') segl,
  (select sum(value_difference) as `Stock Entry Sum` from `tabStock Entry` where docstatus=1) sesu,
  (select sum(total_debit) as `Journal Entry Sum` from `tabJournal Entry` where docstatus=1) jesu,
  (select sum(debit) as `GL Journal Sum` from `tabGL Entry` where voucher_type='Journal Entry') gljs
  )

name: HSN Code Check - Sales Invoice
query: select * from `tabSales Invoice Item` where gst_hsn_code is null and docstatus=1

name: Negative Entry Check
query: select parent, item_code, warehouse from `tabSales Invoice Item` where actual_qty<= 0 and docstatus=1

name: GFK Sales Report
query:
select 
  details.brand,
  details.item_code, 
  sum(qty) as qty, 
  avg(rate) as rate 
from 
  `tabSales Invoice Item` details, 
  `tabSales Invoice` inv 
where 
  inv.name=details.parent 
  and inv.docstatus = 1 
  and inv.posting_date>='2017-07-01' 
  and inv.posting_date<='2017-07-31' 
  and (details.brand='LG' or details.brand='Samsung')
group by item_code 
order by brand, item_code

name: Stock Entry GL Check
query: select asum,name,purpose from (select sum(stock_value_difference) as `asum`, voucher_no from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle where voucher_type = 'Stock Entry' group by voucher_no) a, `tabStock Entry` b where a.voucher_no = b.name and b.docstatus=1 and a.asum <> b.value_difference

name: Exchange Details
query:
select
  inv.posting_date,
  inv.letter_head,
  inv.name,
  inv.customer_name,
  det.exchange_details,
  group_concat(det.item_code) as `items_bought`
from
  `tabSales Invoice` inv,
  `tabSales Invoice Item` det
where
  det.parent = inv.name
  and inv.docstatus = 1
  and det.under_exchange = 1
group by
  det.parent
order by 
  inv.letter_head,
  inv.posting_date

name: SLE vs BIN Stock
query:
select * from (
select it.brand, it.item_group, it.item_code,
(select sum(actual_qty) from `tabBin` where item_code=it.item_code) as bin_qty,
(select sum(actual_qty) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` where item_code=it.item_code) as sle_qty
from `tabItem` it group by it.item_code
) a where bin_qty<>sle_qty

name: Serial No Warehouse Check
query:
select 
  a.name,
  a.warehouse,
  s.warehouse,
  s.item_code
from 
  (select 
        sum(
          ent.actual_qty /
            (LENGTH(TRIM(TRAILING '\n' FROM ent.serial_no)) - 
              LENGTH(REPLACE(TRIM(TRAILING '\n' FROM ent.serial_no), '\n', '')) + 1)) as qty,
        ent.warehouse, 
        serial.name, 
        serial.item_code, 
        ent.voucher_no 
      from `tabStock Ledger Entry` ent, 
           `tabSerial No` serial 
      where 
        ent.serial_no like concat('%',serial.name,'%') 
        and ent.item_code=serial.item_code 
      group by 
        serial.name, warehouse) a, 
  `tabSerial No` s 
where 
  a.name=s.name 
  and a.qty>=1
  and a.warehouse<>s.warehouse

name: Tax Check
query:
(select 
  inv.posting_date, 
  item.parent, 
  item.item_code, 
  inv.reference_details, 
  item.rate, 
  inv.grand_total 
 from `tabSales Invoice Item` item, 
      `tabSales Invoice` inv, 
      `tabSales Taxes and Charges` tax 
 where inv.name=item.parent 
  and inv.name=tax.parent 
  and tax.included_in_print_rate=1 
  and item.net_rate=item.rate 
  and item.rate>0 
  and inv.docstatus=1 
 order by posting_date, parent) 
  union all
(select 
  inv.posting_date, 
  inv.name, 
  null, 
  inv.reference_details, 
  inv.grand_total,  
  inv.grand_total 
 from `tabSales Invoice` inv 
 where inv.docstatus = 1 
  and inv.total_taxes_and_charges = 0
  and inv.grand_total>0)

name: Sale Report
query:
select 
  inv.letter_head,
  inv.name,
  inv.posting_date,
  inv.customer_name,
  addr.address_line1,
  addr.address_line2,
  addr.city,
  cust.primary_contact_no,
  item.brand, 
  item.item_group,
  item.item_code,
  trim(trailing '\n' FROM item.serial_no) as serial_no,
  item.rate
from `tabSales Invoice` inv,
   `tabSales Invoice Item` item,
   `tabCustomer` cust,
   `tabAddress` addr
where
   inv.name=item.parent
   and inv.docstatus=1
   and inv.name=item.parent
   and item.brand = 'LG'
   and inv.customer=cust.name
   and addr.address_title=cust.name 
   and addr.name=inv.customer_address 
   and inv.posting_date>='2017-08-01'     
order by inv.posting_date, inv.name

name: Letter Head Check
query:
(select 'Payment Entry', name, party_name, letter_head from `tabPayment Entry` where (name like '%RH%' and docstatus=1 and letter_head not like '%Ranjeet%') or (name like '%GB%' and docstatus=1 and letter_head not like '%Geeta%') or (name like '%VN%' and docstatus=1 and letter_head not like '%Vijay N%'))
union all
(select 'Sales Invoice', name, customer_name, letter_head from `tabSales Invoice` where (name like '%RH%' and docstatus=1 and letter_head not like '%Ranjeet%') or (name like '%GB%' and docstatus=1 and letter_head not like '%Geeta%') or (name like '%VN%' and docstatus=1 and letter_head not like '%Vijay N%'))

name: Serial Nos for Price Drop
query:
select 
  serial.name,
  serial.item_code,
  serial.brand,
  serial.delivery_date,
  min(sle.posting_date) as purchase_date,
  count(*)
from 
  `tabSerial No` serial,
  `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle
where
  sle.item_code=serial.item_code
  and serial.item_code regexp ('49E400|43ES480|49ES480|49ES630|55ES500|49EX600|55EX600')
  and sle.voucher_no not in (select name from `tabStock Entry` where purpose='Material Transfer')  
  and serial.name regexp REPLACE(TRIM(TRAILING '\n' FROM sle.serial_no), '\n', '|')
  and (serial.delivery_date is null or serial.delivery_date >= '2017-10-01')
group by
  serial.name
order by 
  item_code

name: Cash Sales Total
query:
select 
  posting_date,
  sum(grand_total) as `Total`
from
  `tabSales Invoice`
where
  docstatus = 1
  and posting_date>='2017-12-05'
  and posting_date<='2017-12-05'
  and customer_name like 'CASH S%'
  and letter_head like 'Geeta %'
group by posting_date
order by posting_date

name: Tax Vs State Query
query:
select 
  inv.customer,
  inv.customer_name,
  addr.state,
  addr.gst_state,
  inv.taxes_and_charges
from
  `tabSales Invoice` inv,
  `tabCustomer` cust,
  `tabAddress` addr 
where
  cust.name=inv.customer
  and inv.docstatus = 1
  and inv.posting_date >= '2017-08-01'
  and inv.posting_date <= '2017-08-31'
  and addr.address_title=cust.name
order by
  inv.posting_date

name: Samsung Sales for Uploading
query:
select
  item.item_code,
  item.brand,
  item.item_group,
  concat('"',serial.name,'"') as serial_no,
  sales.customer_name,
  sales.posting_date,
  sales.address_display,
  cust.primary_contact_no,
  details.rate
from
  `tabSerial No` serial,
  `tabItem` item,
  `tabSales Invoice` sales,
  `tabSales Invoice Item` details,
  `tabCustomer` cust
 where
  item.item_code=serial.item_code
  and sales.name=serial.sales_invoice
  and sales.docstatus=1
  and cust.name=sales.customer
  and sales.posting_date>='2017-09-01'
  and item.brand='Samsung'
  and details.parent=sales.name
order by
  item.item_code, 
  serial.name, 
  sales.posting_date, 
  sales.customer_name

name: Warehouse Mismatch Issue
query:
select * from (select 
  concat('"',serial.name,'"') as serial_no, 
  serial.item_code, 
  serial.warehouse, 
  (select 
    sle.warehouse
  from 
    `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle
  where
    sle.item_code=serial.item_code
    and sle.serial_no like concat('%',serial.name,'%')
    and actual_qty>0
  order by posting_date desc,creation desc limit 1) as was_in_warehouse,
  (select 
    sle.warehouse
  from
   `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle
  where
    sle.item_code=serial.item_code
    and sle.serial_no like concat('%',serial.name,'%')
    and actual_qty < 0
    and voucher_type not like '%Stock En%'
  order by posting_date desc,creation desc limit 1) as sold_from_warehouse
from 
  `tabSerial No` serial) data
where
  sold_from_warehouse <> was_in_warehouse

description: Lists Sales Invoices where Taxable Amount is 0 while it should have been not 0.
name: Tax Amount vs Taxable Amount Mismatch
query:
select 
  item.parent, 
  item.item_code, 
  item.base_rate, 
  item.net_amount 
from 
  `tabSales Invoice Item` item,
  `tabSales Invoice` inv 
where 
  inv.name=item.parent 
  and inv.docstatus=1 
  and inv.posting_date>='2018-02-01' 
  and inv.posting_date<='2018-02-28' 
  and item.base_rate*item.qty=item.net_amount
query_name: Tax Amount vs Taxable Amount Mismatch

name: GST Detailed Report
query:
select *, 
 cast((net_amount*tax_rate/100) as decimal(17,2)) as total_tax,
 if(flag,cast((net_amount*tax_rate/100) as decimal(17,2)),0) as IGST,
 if(flag,0,cast(((net_amount*tax_rate/100)/2) as decimal(17,2))) as SGST from (
  select 
  item.parent, 
  sales.reporting_name,
  sales.posting_date,  
  sales.customer_name,
  (select 
    b_addr.gstin 
   from 
    `tabAddress` b_addr 
   where 
    b_addr.address_title=cust.name 
    and b_addr.name=sales.customer_address
  ) as billing_gstin,
  sales.special_invoice,
  addr.gstin,
  addr.city,
  addr.state,
  addr.gst_state_number,
  item.item_code, 
  item.description, 
  item.item_group, 
  item.gst_hsn_code,
  item.item_tax_rate, 
  left(right(item.item_tax_rate,5),4) as tax_rate_1,   
  mid(item.item_tax_rate,locate(':',item.item_tax_rate,locate('IGST',item.item_tax_rate))+1,5) as tax_rate, 
  sum(item.qty) as qty, 
  cast(avg(item.net_rate) as decimal(17,2)) as net_rate,   
  cast(sum(item.net_amount) as decimal(17,2)) as net_amount,
  
  ((gst_state_number<>0 and gst_state_number<>23) or 
  ((gstin is not null and gstin<>'' and left(gstin,2)<>23) or
  (state is not null and state not regexp ('MADHYA PRADESH|M.P.|M.P|MP')) and
  (state is not null and state<>''))) as flag

from 
  `tabSales Invoice Item` item,
  `tabSales Invoice` sales,
  `tabAddress` addr,
  `tabCustomer` cust
where 
  sales.docstatus=1
  and sales.name=item.parent
  and addr.address_title=cust.name
  and sales.shipping_address_name=addr.name
  and sales.posting_date>='2018-11-01'
  and sales.posting_date<='2018-11-30'
group by
  item.gst_hsn_code,
  item.parent,
  tax_rate
order by
  sales.name,
  sales.posting_date) a

name: Posting Date Problem
query:
select * from ((select distinct
  'Payment Entry' as `Document Type`,
  error_pe.letter_head,
  main_pe.name, 
  main_pe.posting_date
from 
  `tabPayment Entry` main_pe,
  (select 
    letter_head,
    max(pe.name) as name, 
    pe.posting_date 
  from   
    `tabPayment Entry` pe 
  where   
    pe.name < (select 
        max(name) 
       from 
         `tabPayment Entry` 
       where 
          posting_date = (pe.posting_date - interval 1 day) 
        and letter_head = pe.letter_head
        and posting_date < '2018-08-01' 
        and posting_date > '2018-03-31'
        and docstatus=1) 
    and posting_date < '2018-08-01' 
    and posting_date > '2018-03-31'  
    and docstatus=1 
  group by 
    pe.posting_date 
  order by
    pe.posting_date) error_pe
where 
  main_pe.posting_date >= (error_pe.posting_date - interval 1 day) 
  and main_pe.posting_date <= (error_pe.posting_date + interval 1 day)
  and main_pe.letter_head = error_pe.letter_head
order by
  error_pe.letter_head, 
  main_pe.name)
union all
(select distinct
  'Sales Invoice' as `Document Type`,
  error_pe.letter_head,
  main_pe.name, 
  main_pe.posting_date
from 
  `tabSales Invoice` main_pe,
  (select 
    letter_head,
    max(pe.name) as name, 
    pe.posting_date 
  from   
    `tabSales Invoice` pe 
  where   
    pe.name < (select 
        max(name) 
       from 
         `tabSales Invoice` 
       where 
          posting_date = (pe.posting_date - interval 1 day) 
        and letter_head = pe.letter_head
        and posting_date < '2018-08-01' 
        and posting_date > '2018-03-31'
        and docstatus=1) 
    and posting_date < '2018-08-01' 
    and posting_date > '2018-03-31'  
    and docstatus=1 
  group by 
    pe.posting_date 
  order by
    pe.posting_date) error_pe
where 
  main_pe.posting_date >= (error_pe.posting_date - interval 1 day) 
  and main_pe.posting_date <= (error_pe.posting_date + interval 1 day)
  and main_pe.letter_head = error_pe.letter_head
order by
  error_pe.letter_head, 
  main_pe.name)) data

name: Current Salaries
query:
select 
  e.branch,
  se.employee_name, 
  se.parent,
  se.base 
from 
  `tabSalary Structure Employee` se,
  `tabEmployee` e
where 
  se.from_date <= '2018-04-01'
  and (se.to_date is null or se.to_date >= '2018-04-30')
  and se.parent in (select name from `tabSalary Structure`
        where is_active = 'Yes')
  and e.name=se.employee
  and e.status='Active'

name: Monthly Invoice Nos
query:
select
  concat(monthname(posting_date),' ',year(posting_date)) as `Month`,
  letter_head as `Branch`,
  min(name) as `Starting Invoice No`,
  max(name) as `End Invoice No`
from
  `tabSales Invoice`
where
  posting_date >= '2018-01-01'
  and posting_date <= '2018-03-31'
group by
  letter_head,
  month(posting_date)
order by
  letter_head,
  month(posting_date)

name: Outstanding Details for Adjustments
query:
select 
  *,
  cast(`Total Debit`-`Total Credit` as Decimal(17,2)) as `Balance`,
  cast((((`Total Debit`-`Total Credit`)/`Total Debit`)*100) as Decimal(8,2)) as `Percentage`,
  cast((((`Total Debit`-`Total Credit`)/`Total Inv Value`)*100) as Decimal(8,2)) as `Inv Percentage`
from
  (select 
    dump.party,
    customer.customer_name,
    cast(sum(dump.debit) as Decimal(17,2)) as `Total Debit`,
    cast(sum(dump.credit) as Decimal(17,2)) as `Total Credit`,
    count(dump.hypothecation) as `Hypothecation`,
    (select 
      cast(sum(grand_total) as Decimal(17,2))
     from 
      `tabSales Invoice` 
     where 
      customer=party 
      and docstatus=1
      and posting_date >= '2018-04-01'
      and posting_date <= '2018-06-30'    
    ) as `Total Inv Value`    
  from
  (select 
      gl_entry.voucher_type,
      gl_entry.voucher_no,
      gl_entry.posting_date,
      gl_entry.debit,
      gl_entry.credit,
      gl_entry.party,
      sales_invoice.hypothecation,
      sales_invoice.reference
    from   
      `tabGL Entry` gl_entry
      left join
      `tabSales Invoice` sales_invoice
      on
      gl_entry.voucher_no = sales_invoice.name
    where   
      gl_entry.party_type = 'Customer'
      and gl_entry.posting_date >= '2018-04-01'
      and gl_entry.posting_date <= '2018-06-30'
    order by 
      gl_entry.posting_date) as dump,
    `tabCustomer` customer
  where
    customer.name = dump.party
  group by 
    dump.party) as data

name: Balances Queries
query:
// Opening Balances - Tally Closing - Draft only
select 
 u.`Root`,
 u.`Parent`,
 u.`Account`,
 u.`Party Name`,
 sum(u.`Debit`) as `Debit`,
 sum(u.`Credit`) as `Credit`
from 
((select
  acc.root_type as `Root`,
  acc.parent_account as `Parent`,
  jour_details.account as `Account`,
  jour_details.party_name as `Party Name`,
  sum(jour_details.debit) as `Debit`,
  sum(jour_details.credit) as `Credit`
from
  `tabJournal Entry` jour,
  `tabJournal Entry Account` jour_details,
  `tabAccount` acc
where
  jour.docstatus = 0
  and jour.posting_date <= '2017-06-30'
  and jour.name = jour_details.parent
  and acc.name = jour_details.account
group by
  jour_details.party_name,
  jour_details.account
order by
  acc.root_type,
  acc.parent_account,
  jour_details.account)
union all
(select
  acc.root_type as `Root`,
  acc.parent_account as `Parent`,  
  details.account as `Account`,
  null as `Party Name`,
  sum(details.debit_in_account_currency) as `Debit`,
  sum(details.credit_in_account_currency) as `Credit`
 from
  `tabGL Entry` details,
  `tabStock Entry` entry,
  `tabAccount` acc
 where
  entry.name = details.voucher_no
  and entry.posting_date <= '2017-06-30'
  and entry.purpose like '%Material Rec%'
  and acc.name = details.account
  and entry.docstatus = 1
 group by
  details.account
)) u 
group by 
   u.`Party Name`,
   u.`Account` 
order by 
   u.`Root`, 
   u.`Parent`, 
   u.`Account`

//Trial Balance
select 
 u.`Root`,
 u.`Parent`,
 u.`Account`,
 u.`Party`,
 u.`Party Name`,
 cast((case when (u.`Opening Balance` < 0) then
         abs(u.`Opening Balance`)
      else 0 end) as Decimal(17,2)) as `Opening Credit`,
 cast((case when (u.`Opening Balance` > 0) then
         abs(u.`Opening Balance`)
      else 0 end) as Decimal(17,2)) as `Opening Debit`,  
 cast((case when (u.`Closing Balance` < 0) then
         abs(u.`Closing Balance`)
      else 0 end) as Decimal(17,2)) as `Closing Credit`,  
 cast((case when (u.`Closing Balance` > 0) then
         abs(u.`Closing Balance`)
      else 0 end) as Decimal(17,2)) as `Closing Debit`  ,
  u.`Current Balance`
from 
(select
  acc.root_type as `Root`,
  acc.parent_account as `Parent`,
  acc.name as `Account`,
  gl_entry.party as `Party`,
  parties.`Party Name` as `Party Name`,
  sum(if(posting_date<'2017-07-01',debit-credit,0)) as `Opening Balance`,
  sum(if(posting_date<='2018-03-31',debit-credit,0)) as `Closing Balance`,
  sum(if(posting_date<=curdate(),debit-credit,0)) as `Current Balance`
from
  `tabAccount` acc,
  (`tabGL Entry` gl_entry left join 
  ((select 'Customer' as party_type, name, customer_name as `Party Name` from `tabCustomer`)
  union all
  (select 'Supplier' as party_type, name, supplier_name as `Party Name` from `tabSupplier`)
  union all
  (select 'Employee' as party_type, name, employee_name as `Party Name` from `tabEmployee`)) as parties
  on (parties.name = gl_entry.party and parties.party_type=gl_entry.party_type))
where
  acc.name = gl_entry.account
group by
  gl_entry.account,
  `Party`
order by
  acc.root_type,
  acc.parent_account,
  acc.name,
  `Party Name`) u

  
//Customer Current Balance
select
  gl_entry.party as `Party`,
  parties.`Party Name` as `Party Name`,
  max(if(voucher_type = 'Sales Invoice',posting_date,NULL)) as `Latest Sales Invoice`,
  cast(sum(if(posting_date<'2017-07-01',debit-credit,0)) as Decimal(17,2)) as `Opening Balance`,
  cast(sum(if((posting_date>='2017-07-01' and posting_date<='2018-03-31'),debit,0)) as Decimal(17,2)) as `Total Debit`,
  cast(sum(if((posting_date>='2017-07-01' and posting_date<='2018-03-31'),credit,0)) as Decimal(17,2)) as `Total Credit`,
  cast(sum(if(posting_date<='2018-03-31',debit-credit,0)) as Decimal(17,2)) as `Closing Balance`,
  cast(sum(if(posting_date<=curdate(),debit-credit,0)) as Decimal(17,2)) as `Current Balance`
from
  (`tabGL Entry` gl_entry left join 
  ((select 'Customer' as party_type, name, customer_name as `Party Name` from `tabCustomer`)) as parties
  on (parties.name = gl_entry.party and parties.party_type=gl_entry.party_type))
where
  gl_entry.party_type = 'Customer'
group by
  `Party`
order by
  `Party Name`

name: Quantitative Details for Balance Sheet
query:
select
  item.brand,
  item.item_group,
  sum(if(stock.posting_date <= '2017-06-30', actual_qty, 0)) as `Opening`,
  sum(if(stock.posting_date <= '2017-06-30', stock_value_difference, 0)) as `Opening Value`,  
  abs(sum(if((stock.posting_date>='2017-07-01' and stock.voucher_type = 'Purchase Invoice'), actual_qty, 0))) as `Purchase Qty`,
  abs(sum(if((stock.posting_date>='2017-07-01' and stock.voucher_type = 'Purchase Invoice'), stock_value_difference, 0))) as `Purchase Value`,
  abs(sum(if((stock.posting_date>='2017-07-01' and stock.voucher_type = 'Sales Invoice'), actual_qty, 0))) as `Sales Qty`,
  abs(sum(if((stock.posting_date>='2017-07-01' and stock.voucher_type = 'Sales Invoice'), stock_value_difference, 0))) as `Sales Value`,  
  sum(actual_qty) as `Balance Qty`,
  sum(stock_value_difference) as `Balance Value`
from 
    (`tabStock Ledger Entry` stock left join `tabStock Entry` entry on (entry.name = stock.voucher_no)),
    `tabItem` item
where
    (entry.purpose = 'Material Receipt' or entry.purpose is null)   
    and stock.voucher_type != 'Delivery Note'
    and stock.posting_date >= '2017-04-01'
    and stock.posting_date <= '2018-03-31'
    and stock.item_code = item.item_code
group by
  item.brand, item.item_group
order by
  item.brand, item.item_group

name: Free Serial Nos
query: select serial.name, serial.item_code, serial.warehouse from `tabSerial No` serial, `tabPurchase Invoice` inv where inv.name = serial.purchase_document_no and inv.supplier_name like 'Samsung%' and inv.docstatus = 1 and serial.item_code like '%-J600%'

name: GST Debit/Credit Notes
query:
select 
  data.name as `Voucher No`,
  data.posting_date as `Date`,
  ifnull(max(data.party_name), max(if(data.account regexp ('SGST|CGST|Supplier'),null,data.account))) as `Party`,
  sum(if(data.account not regexp ('SGST|CGST|Supplier'),debit,0)) as `Total Value`,
  sum(if(data.account like 'SGST%',credit,0)) as `SGST`,
  sum(if(data.account like 'CGST%',credit,0)) as `CGST`,  
  sum(if(data.account like 'Suppl%',credit,0)) as `Taxable Value`,
  data.remark as `Remarks`
from
  (
   select 
     JE.posting_date,
     JE.name,
     JEA.account,
     JEA.party_name,
     JEA.debit,
     JEA.credit,
     JE.remark
   from
     `tabJournal Entry` JE,
     `tabJournal Entry Account` JEA
   where
     JE.name = JEA.parent
     and JE.docstatus = 1
     and JE.name in (
      select 
        J1.parent
      from
        `tabJournal Entry Account` J1
        inner join
        `tabJournal Entry Account` J2
        on J1.parent = J2.parent
      where
        J1.account like 'SGST%'
        and J2.account like 'Supplier%'
      order by
        J1.parent
      )
    ) data
group by
  data.name
order by
  data.posting_date
